fieldUpdates.formula: IF( OR( ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Recurring_Amount_Change__c)), ISNEW() ), Recurring_Amount_Change__c, (Recurring_Amount_Change__c - PRIORVALUE(Recurring_Amount_Change__c)) + Recurring_Amount_Change_Update__c )
fieldUpdates.name: Populate Recurring Amount Change Update

rules.description: Rule Code: OPC-001xFxx Populate Recurring Amount Change Update Updates the recurring amount change update field when the recurring amount change field is updated.
